snippet: A navy officer put in charge of Mexico’s second-largest port in an effort to wrest control of it from a drug gang was shot and killed in what the authorities said Thursday was a robbery attempt.
abstract: Gunmen in Mexico kill Navy officer Rear Adm Jose Luis Corro Chavez during robbery attempt.
lead_paragraph: A navy officer put in charge of Mexico’s second-largest port in an effort to wrest control of it from a drug gang was shot and killed in what the authorities said Thursday was a robbery attempt.

headline.main: Mexico: Gunmen Kill a Navy Officer
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Gunmen Kill a Navy Officer
